availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Kinder (Hancock County KY, miner & home guard soldier)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, miner and soldier. Indiana native. Married to Sallie Kinder. Father of Charles Kinder and George Kinder. Miner in Hancock County in 1860. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard in June 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 118.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville Voting District, p. 36.
KYR-0002-022-0048.
